pages.text: The Quartz Grindstone provides a low tech solution for getting more out of your mining trips. It is much cheaper than its more high-tech counter parts of other mods, but it is slow and a considerable time sink, but what else do you have to do while smelting those dusts? Why not grind up some other ores into dusts?
Used to grind items up in the Quartz Grindstone or used to hand crank the Charger. To install the crank sneak and right-click with it on the hole.
